Header: Genderless looks merges with traditonal at New York Fashion Week
Content: Menswear designers debuted their fall/winter 2019 collections at New York Fashion Week: Mens.Spanish fashion house, Palomo Spain, presented its eighth collection on the first of three days of shows. The line, which was inspired by ‘Diaghilev’s Ballets Russes and the rural Spain of the early 20th century’, featured ‘historical references’ with a modern flare.The brand stayed true to its mission of giving men the freedom of being fabulous. Designer Vasilis Loizides made his NYFW: Men’s debut with his own genderless collection.New York brand Descendant of Thieves is hoping to send a message of love with its new line.
